query: alter table NPSS_TRANSACTIONS alter column HDR_CREATED_DATE drop not null;update NPSS_TRANSACTIONS set HDR_CREATED_DATE=null;alter table NPSS_TRANSACTIONS alter column HDR_SETTLEMENT_DATE drop not null;update NPSS_TRANSACTIONS set HDR_SETTLEMENT_DATE=null;alter table NPSS_TRANSACTIONS alter column ACCP_DATE_TIME drop not null;update NPSS_TRANSACTIONS set ACCP_DATE_TIME=null;alter table NPSS_TRANSACTIONS alter column HDR_CREATED_DATE type CHARACTER VARYING(64) using cast( HDR_CREATED_DATE AS CHARACTER VARYING(64)), alter column HDR_SETTLEMENT_DATE type CHARACTER VARYING(64) using cast( HDR_SETTLEMENT_DATE AS CHARACTER VARYING(64)), alter column ACCP_DATE_TIME type CHARACTER VARYING(64) using cast( ACCP_DATE_TIME AS CHARACTER VARYING(64));

alter table NPSS_TRANSACTIONS alter column HDR_CREATED_DATE type CHARACTER VARYING(64),alter column HDR_SETTLEMENT_DATE type CHARACTER VARYING(64),alter column ACCP_DATE_TIME type CHARACTER VARYING(64);
